# PPT Master

**AI-powered executive presentation generator.** Give it a topic, choose a theme, and it builds a polished multi-slide PPTX — slides selected by AI, content generated by LLM, design rendered by code.

---

## What It Does

PPT Master turns a topic sentence into a complete presentation:

1. **Selects** which slide types belong in this presentation (from 32 available layouts)
2. **Structures** them into logical sections
3. **Generates** all content — headlines, bullets, metrics, chart data, tables — via LLM
4. **Renders** a professionally styled PPTX using your chosen visual theme

A funding pitch gets 12-15 slides. An earnings report gets 20+. The AI decides based on topic depth and audience.

---

## Quickstart

### Install

```bash
# Clone and set up
git clone https://github.com/sriramakh/ppt-master.git
cd ppt-master

python -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate      # Windows: .venv\Scripts\activate
pip install -e .
```

### Configure API key

```bash
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env and add your OpenAI API key:
# PPTMASTER_OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...
```

### Build your first presentation

```bash
pptmaster ai-build \
  --topic "Q4 2025 Earnings Report" \
  --company "Meridian Capital" \
  --theme finance \
  --audience "Investors" \
  -o earnings_q4.pptx
```

That's it. Open `earnings_q4.pptx` in PowerPoint or Keynote.

---

## Usage

### CLI

```bash
# Full AI-powered presentation
pptmaster ai-build --topic "..." --company "..." --theme corporate -o out.pptx

# Start interactive chat to build & edit in real-time
pptmaster chat --topic "..." --theme corporate

# Build a 40-slide design template (no LLM)
pptmaster build-template --theme technology -o tech_template.pptx

# List available themes
pptmaster list-themes

# Analyze an existing PPTX template
pptmaster analyze -t template.pptx

# Generate from a document
pptmaster from-doc -i report.pdf -t template.pptx -o out.pptx

# Launch Streamlit web UI
streamlit run src/pptmaster/web/streamlit_app.py
```

#### `ai-build` options

| Flag | Default | Description |
|------|---------|-------------|
| `--topic` | *(required)* | What the presentation is about |
| `--company` | `"Acme Corp"` | Company or organization name |
| `--theme` | `corporate` | Visual theme key (see table below) |
| `--audience` | `""` | Target audience (improves content selection) |
| `--industry` | `""` | Industry context |
| `--context` | `""` | Extra instructions for the AI |
| `-o` / `--output` | `output.pptx` | Output file path |
| `--provider` | `openai` | LLM provider: `openai` or `minimax` |

---

### Python API

```python
from pptmaster.builder.ai_builder import ai_build_presentation

# One-liner: AI picks slides, generates content, builds PPTX
path = ai_build_presentation(
    topic="AI Platform Product Launch",
    company_name="NexTech Systems",
    theme_key="technology",
    audience="CTO and Engineering Leadership",
    output_path="nextech_launch.pptx",
)
print(f"Saved to: {path}")
```

#### Two-step workflow: inspect before building

```python
from pptmaster.content.builder_content_gen import generate_builder_content
from pptmaster.builder.ai_builder import _build_selective_pptx
from pptmaster.builder.themes import get_theme
from pathlib import Path

# Step 1: Generate and inspect content
result = generate_builder_content(
    topic="Series B Funding Pitch",
    company_name="Velocity Ventures",
    industry="Startup / VC",
    audience="Venture Capitalists",
)
print("Selected slides:", result["selected_slides"])
print("Sections:", [s["title"] for s in result["sections"]])

# Optionally edit result["content"] here...

# Step 2: Build from content
theme = get_theme("startup")
_build_selective_pptx(result, theme, "Velocity Ventures", Path("pitch.pptx"))
```

#### Build a static 40-slide template (no LLM)

```python
from pptmaster.builder.template_builder import build_template

path = build_template(
    theme_key="healthcare",
    company_name="MedTech Solutions",
    output_path="healthcare_template.pptx",
)
```

---

### MCP Server (for AI Agents)

PPT Master ships an MCP server with 11 tools. Any MCP-compatible agent can call these tools directly.

#### Setup in Agent Workspace

Add to `.agent/settings.local.json`:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "pptmaster": {
      "command": "/path/to/.venv/bin/python",
      "args": ["-m", "pptmaster.mcp_server"],
      "cwd": "/path/to/ppt-master",
      "env": {
        "PYTHONPATH": "/path/to/ppt-master/src"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

#### Available MCP tools

| Tool | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `list_themes` | Table of all 14 themes with colors and style |
| `list_slide_types` | All 32 selectable slide types |
| `get_slide_type_details` | Content keys and defaults for one slide type |
| `get_theme_details` | Full color/font/style config for a theme |
| `build_template` | 40-slide PPTX template, no LLM needed |
| `build_presentation` | Full AI pipeline: content gen + PPTX build |
| `generate_content` | LLM content JSON only, no PPTX |
| `build_from_content` | Build PPTX from an existing content dict |
| `build_single_slide` | 1-slide PPTX for rapid prototyping |
| `list_icons` | Browse 144 icons by category or keyword |
| `get_icon_path` | Get absolute PNG path for an icon |

---

### Agent Slash Commands

When working in this project, the Agent exposes these slash commands:

| Command | What it does |
|---------|-------------|
| `/ppt-build [topic] [theme]` | Full AI presentation |
| `/ppt-build-template [theme]` | 40-slide static template |
| `/ppt-build-slide [type] [theme]` | Single-slide PPTX preview |
| `/ppt-list-themes` | Show all themes |
| `/ppt-list-slides [type]` | Show all slide types, or details for one |
| `/ppt-generate-content [topic]` | Generate content JSON for review |
| `/ppt-icons [category]` | Browse the icon library |

---

## Themes

14 industry-specific visual themes. Each has a unique color palette, typography, and layout style.

| Key | Industry | Style | Primary | Accent | Font |
|-----|----------|-------|---------|--------|------|
| `corporate` | General Corporate | Classic | `#1B2A4A` | `#C8A951` | Inter |
| `healthcare` | Healthcare | Minimal | `#0F4C5C` | `#E36414` | Inter |
| `technology` | Technology | Dark | `#0F172A` | `#06B6D4` | Inter |
| `finance` | Finance | Elevated | `#14532D` | `#D4AF37` | Inter |
| `education` | Education | Bold | `#881337` | `#D4A574` | Inter |
| `sustainability` | Sustainability | Editorial | `#064E3B` | `#92400E` | Inter |
| `luxury` | Luxury & Fashion | Gradient | `#1A1A2E` | `#B76E79` | Inter |
| `startup` | Startup / VC | Split | `#3B0764` | `#EA580C` | Inter |
| `government` | Government | Geo | `#1E3A5F` | `#B91C1C` | Inter |
| `realestate` | Real Estate | Retro | `#374151` | `#D97706` | Inter |
| `creative` | Creative & Media | Magazine | `#18181B` | `#BE185D` | Inter |
| `academic` | Academic / University | Scholarly | `#1E3A5F` | `#9B2335` | Inter |
| `research` | Research / Scientific | Laboratory | `#0D4F4F` | `#D97706` | Inter |
| `report` | Reports / Analysis | Dashboard | `#1F2937` | `#0891B2` | Inter |

Each theme has pre-built sample content and a unique combination of visual style variants — different cover layouts, section dividers, KPI cards, chart styles, and diagram types.

Pre-built template files are in `templates/` (one per theme, 40 slides each).

---

## Slide Types

The AI picks from 32 selectable slide types. These are always included automatically: **Cover, Table of Contents, Section Dividers (×7), Thank You**.

### Identity & Overview
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `company_overview` | Mission statement + 4 quick facts |
| `our_values` | 4 core values with descriptions |
| `team_leadership` | 4 executives with names, titles, and bios |
| `key_facts` | 6 large headline statistics |

### Strategy & Analysis
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `executive_summary` | 5 key bullets + 3 headline metrics |
| `kpi_dashboard` | 4 KPIs with values, trends, progress bars |
| `swot_matrix` | SWOT analysis (4 quadrants) |
| `comparison` | Side-by-side comparison (6 metrics) |
| `matrix_quadrant` | 2×2 positioning matrix |
| `venn_diagram` | Overlap / intersection diagram |

### Data & Charts
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `bar_chart` | Grouped bar chart (3–8 categories, 1–4 series) |
| `line_chart` | Line chart (3–8 periods, 1–4 series) |
| `pie_chart` | Pie / donut chart (3–8 segments) |
| `data_table` | 5-column table with 6 rows |
| `infographic_dashboard` | KPIs + chart + progress bars mixed layout |
| `gauge_dashboard` | Circular gauges for 3–4 metrics |

### Process & Flow
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `process_linear` | 5-step left-to-right process |
| `process_circular` | 4-phase cycle diagram |
| `funnel_diagram` | Funnel (stages narrowing to outcome) |
| `pyramid_hierarchy` | Layered pyramid hierarchy |
| `hub_spoke` | Central hub with radiating concepts |

### Planning & Tracking
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `roadmap_timeline` | 5-milestone horizontal timeline |
| `milestone_roadmap` | Detailed roadmap with dates and owners |
| `kanban_board` | 3-column card board (To Do / Doing / Done) |
| `risk_matrix` | Probability × impact risk heat map |

### Content Layouts
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `two_column` | Two equal-width content columns |
| `three_column` | Three pillars / offerings |
| `highlight_quote` | Full-slide pull quote |
| `text_image` | Text + image side-by-side |
| `icon_grid` | Icon + label grid (uses asset library) |

### Closing
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `next_steps` | 4 action items with owners and dates |
| `call_to_action` | Bold CTA with contact details |
| `sources` | Bibliography / references (4–8 citations) |

---

## Example Use Cases

```bash
# Startup funding pitch
pptmaster ai-build --topic "Series B Funding Pitch" --company "Velocity Ventures" \
  --theme startup --audience "Venture Capitalists" -o pitch.pptx

# Healthcare board presentation
pptmaster ai-build --topic "Patient Outcomes Q3 Review" --company "MedTech Solutions" \
  --theme healthcare --audience "Hospital Board" -o patient_outcomes.pptx

# Technology product launch
pptmaster ai-build --topic "AI Platform Product Launch" --company "NexTech Systems" \
  --theme technology --audience "CTO / Engineering" -o launch.pptx

# Sustainability strategy
pptmaster ai-build --topic "Carbon Neutrality Roadmap 2030" --company "EcoForward Group" \
  --theme sustainability --audience "Stakeholders" -o carbon_roadmap.pptx

# Academic research
pptmaster ai-build --topic "Current Trends in AI and Future Directions" \
  --company "Stanford AI Lab" --theme academic --audience "Faculty & Researchers" \
  -o ai_trends.pptx

# Executive market report
pptmaster ai-build --topic "Q1 2026 Global Market Analysis" \
  --company "McKinsey Analytics" --theme report --audience "Executive Leadership" \
  -o market_report.pptx
```

---

## Icon Library

144 PNG icons across 14 categories, used automatically by the `icon_grid` slide type and available for any slide.

**Categories:** analytics, business, communication, creative, education, finance, healthcare, logistics, people, real-estate, security, sustainability, technology

```bash
# Browse by category
pptmaster list-icons --category technology

# Find by keyword (returns absolute path)
pptmaster get-icon --query "cloud"
```

Icons live in `data/icons/{category}/{name}.png`.

---

## Configuration

Environment variables (`.env` file):

```bash
PPTMASTER_OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...          # Required for AI builds
PPTMASTER_MODEL=gpt-4o                  # LLM model (default: gpt-4o)
PPTMASTER_CACHE_DIR=data/cache          # Content cache directory

# Optional: MiniMax provider
PPTMASTER_MINIMAX_API_KEY=...
PPTMASTER_MINIMAX_BASE_URL=https://api.minimax.io/v1/
PPTMASTER_MINIMAX_MODEL=MiniMax-M2.5
```

---

## Troubleshooting

**"LLM generation failed"**
- Check your API key in `.env`
- Verify network access to the LLM provider
- Try `--provider openai` or `--provider minimax` explicitly

**Slides have placeholder/generic content**
- The LLM response may have been truncated — re-run or reduce `--context` length
- Some slide types use sensible defaults if keys are missing; re-running usually gives better results

**"Theme not found"**
- Run `pptmaster list-themes` — theme keys are lowercase: `realestate` not `real-estate`

**MCP server won't start**
- Confirm `mcp[cli]` is installed: `pip install "mcp[cli]>=1.0.0"`
- Check the Python path in `settings.local.json` points to your `.venv`

**PPTX opens with missing fonts**
- Install Inter from [rsms.me/inter](https://rsms.me/inter/) — PowerPoint falls back to Calibri if unavailable

## Project Structure

```
ppt-master/
├── src/pptmaster/
│   ├── builder/           # Core PPTX builder (themes, slides, helpers)
│   │   ├── slides/        # 35 individual slide modules (s01–s40)
│   │   ├── themes.py      # 14 TemplateTheme definitions
│   │   ├── ux_styles.py   # 14 UXStyle visual variants
│   │   ├── design_system.py  # Color, type, grid constants
│   │   ├── helpers.py     # 27 drawing primitives
│   │   ├── template_builder.py  # 40-slide static build
│   │   └── ai_builder.py  # AI-driven selective build
│   ├── content/           # LLM content generation
│   │   ├── builder_content_gen.py  # SLIDE_CATALOG + LLM prompt
│   │   └── llm_client.py  # Provider-agnostic OpenAI SDK wrapper
│   ├── analyzer/          # PPTX/POTX template analysis
│   ├── composer/          # Chart, table, image renderers
│   ├── assets/            # Color utils, icon manager
│   ├── cli/               # Typer CLI (app.py)
│   ├── chat/              # Chat engine (loop, session, tools)
│   ├── web/               # Streamlit UI
│   └── mcp_server.py      # 11-tool MCP server
├── templates/             # 14 pre-built 40-slide PPTX files
├── data/icons/            # 144 PNG icons (14 categories)
├── .agent/commands/       # 7 Agent slash commands
└── docs/architecture.md   # Internal architecture reference
```
